title.title: BALI SAFARI PARK AND UBUD TOUR
title.text: BALI SAFARI PARK AND UBUD TOUR
title.html: BALI SAFARI PARK AND UBUD TOUR

tagline.title: BALI SAFARI PARK AND UBUD TOUR IS COMBINATION TOURS PACKAGE TO ENJOY JUNGLE HOPPER PACKAGES AT BALI SAFARI MARINE PARKS AND CONTINUE VISITING TOURIST DESTINATION IN UBUD VILLAGE
tagline.text: BALI SAFARI PARK AND UBUD TOUR IS COMBINATION TOURS PACKAGE TO ENJOY JUNGLE HOPPER PACKAGES AT BALI SAFARI MARINE PARKS AND CONTINUE VISITING TOURIST DESTINATION IN UBUD VILLAGE
tagline.html: BALI SAFARI PARK AND UBUD TOUR IS COMBINATION TOURS PACKAGE TO ENJOY JUNGLE HOPPER PACKAGES AT BALI SAFARI MARINE PARKS AND CONTINUE VISITING TOURIST DESTINATION IN UBUD VILLAGE

description.text: Bali Safari Park and Ubud Tour is a Bali Combination Tour Packages to Explore Bali Safari and Marine Park in Gianyar and do Jungle hopper packages and continue visiting tourist destination in Ubud Village with is beauty and amazing culture. Bali Safari and Marine Park is the biggest parks and famous tourist destination for visiting home of amazing animals. Bali Safari Marine Parks that takes the visitor through the habitats of Indonesia, India and Africa. Coming face to face with many animals, the visitor has the opportunity to see our wildlife living naturally all together in these open range regions and you get to take as many photos as you like. After visiting Bali Safari and Marine park, the tour continue to visit ubud town for visit interesting site in that area such as visiting ubud monkey forest is small rain forest dwell by tame monkey, beside the monkey also we can see the beautiful temple inside the forest. Then visiting ubud palace is traditional house for ubud king long time ago, then visiting ubud art market is biggest traditional art market in ubud town which sell various souvenir, handycraft and etc. After that we go back to hotel with bring an awesome memory feature in this Bali Safari and Ubud Tour, below is short description of tourist destination will be visit.

title.text: Bali Safari and Marine Park - Jungle Hopper Packages
title.html: Bali Safari and Marine Park - Jungle Hopper Packages

image.title: Bali Safari Park and Ubud Tour | Bali Safari and Marine Park - Jungle Hopper Packages | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Features the following exhibits featuring Sumatran elephant, Sumatran tiger, white tiger, leopard, komodo dragon and cheetah are just some of the fascinating creatures that can be seen at the Bali Safari and Marine Park. Fulfilling its mission of conservation, education and recreation. You will enjoy Jungle Hopper Packages by offers an unforgettable tour and education experience among the more than 100 species of animals housed at the recreational park and active wildlife conservation center, Bali Safari Marine Park. Book this package and enjoy explore the biggest bali safari and see many kind of animal and bird, totally full of fun during your holiday

title.title: Ubud Monkey Forest | Bali Safari Park and Ubud Tour

image.title: Ubud Monkey Forest | Bali Safari Park and Ubud Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: The sacred sanctuary of Monkey Forest is located on the southern border of Ubud town around 3 kms south of central town with a leading road also with the name of Monkey Forest. The presence of sacred forest is a demonstration of the harmonious coexistence of humans and nature. In Bali, sanctuaries such as the Ubud Monkey Forest sanctuary are usually in sacred village areas, often surrounded by temples. These cultural sanctuaries are not only an important part of Balinese heritage, but also an important part of everyday live. Located in the center of ubud town and this place most visit site in Ubud area.

title.title: Ubud Royal Palace | Bali Safari Park and Ubud Tour

image.title: Ubud Royal Palace | Bali Safari Park and Ubud Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Ubud Royal Palace is a Ubud Kingdom Palace with excellent Balinese customary houses as a living arrangement of Ubud King. It is situated in the core of Ubud Bali with customary craftsmanship advertise just before it and it is found by Ida Tjokorda Putu Kandel who has instructed from year 1800 - 1823. Ubud has been an "imperial town" for over a hundred years. Its rulers, who bear the title "Tjokorda" or "Agung" still live in customary royal residences, called "Puris". Be mindful, on the other hand, that each spot called "puri" is not an imperial royal residence. The statement has been utilized generously recently. This palace located opposite the ubud market, and most visit place in ubud before visit the market

title.title: Ubud Art Market | Bali Safari Park and Ubud Tour

image.title: Ubud Art Market | Bali Safari Park and Ubud Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Ubud Art Market where the presence is not far not quite the same as different markets accessible in the tourism range. Ubud Art Market as a general public financial matters focus of Ubud. The Ubud art market is biggest art market in Ubud town, lot of local people and tourist visit this place for buy life needed or souvenir, handicraft and other things. There are two building market accessible at the same range those are one square at the Westside is for a local people for buy some stuff such food, vegetables and ceremony tool and other building is for tourist which is the shop mostly sell souvenir, painting and handycraft.

price.title: Bali Safari Park and Ubud Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Safari Park and Ubud Tour Price :

Adult

  • 1 Person : IDR 1,450,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 1,100,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 975,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 950,000/person
  • 5 Person or More : IDR 900,000/person

Children (3 - 12 years) :

  • 1 Child : IDR 800,000/person
  • 2 Child : IDR 775,000/person

Bali Safari Park and Ubud Tour Price Include :

  • Private Car with Good A/C
  • Professional English Speaking Driver
  • Bali Safari and Marine Park – Jungle Hopper Package
  • Lunch Indonesian Food
  • Petrol
  • Entrance Ticket
  • Mineral Water

itinerary.title: Bali Safari Park and Ubud Tour Itinerary :

content.event: Visit Bali Safari and Marine Park
Visit Ubud Monkey Forest
Visit Ubud Royal Palace
Visit Ubud Art Market

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
